attributes.action: Pension date has been extended and I want to know why!
attributes.additional_details:
Having reached the age of 60 years in October 2011,my Pension date was to be paid on 06/03/2012.
Looking forward to having a few coppers next month,I have since checked again my Pension due date and it has been extended to 06/03/2013 when I will be 61 years 7 months and 2 days old.
Needless to say this is unfair as I have never claimed any benefits or dole in my life.
Will this be extended yet again when 2013 rears it's head and my pension will fall another year later.
I am appalled this is allowed to happen.

rejection.details: This is correspondence on a personal issue
